name: Edge of Reality Visual Novel
detailed_description:
It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the whole world than a pawnshop appraiser. But a meeting with a mysterious, but pretty stranger changes Dan's idea of ​​his job.

Too trivial you say? Do not judge by the first impression we say. In this game, you will plunge into a story where dream and reality intertwine into a single whole. Where the kingdom of Morpheus will become closer than you thought before. Where the Reality itself can lose its firmness.

Game features:
- 1-2 hours of gameplay;
- Non-linear passage and unexpected plot twists;
- Unique visual style;
- Music written specifically for this game, allows you to fully convey the atmosphere;

short_description: Dan, who works in a pawnshop, takes a very interesting brooch from a stranger, after which strange things happen to him. Now he has to find the suspicious man who bought the jewel to prevent something terrible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
